item.description: Our next cooking class will be Weds, Feb 22nd from 5:30-8:30 PM. The class will be making Spinach Waldorf Salad with Liquid Gold Dressing; Red Lentil Soup; Quinoa with Broccoli Pesto; Cocoa-Mint Smoothies; Raw Apple Tarts, and herbal tea. Documentary, "A Diet for All Reasons" is optional and will run from 8:30 - 9:30 PM. Fee: $18 Pre-payment is required to confirm your reservation. Checks may be payable to: Pine Community Center and mailed to PCC, PO Box 262, Tilton, NH 03276. We selected this menu for National Heart Month (February).
item.name: Heart-Healthy Vegan Cooking Class, Dinner, & Documentary
